description:
Shaun King on Twitter: "A stunning 55 NYPD police officers have lost TEN or more misconduct lawsuits and are STILL ON THE JOB. 

Officer Peter Valentin sued 28x."
extended: RT @djmlaw1: Is there a single person reading this who would still have job if your employer lost 10 lawsuits over your conduct?
RT @gerald_arthur: very slick @latdatadesk. love the annotations with the raster map
